name: Blue Square Bottle
description: The bottle is made of opaque blue plastic, which protects light-sensitive materials. The pump also features a quick and easy-to-use twist lock to dispense no unnecessary soap. All dispensing pumps include a transparent cover and ship to you in a locked position. Turn the pump head 90Â° counterclockwise to unlock.
